## ‚ö†Ô∏è Mismatched Commands

These hooks have different commands in the two locations:

### `bandit`

**tool_commands.py:**

```python
["uv", "run", "bandit", "-c", "pyproject.toml", "-r", "crackerjack"]
```

**.pre-commit-config.yaml:**

```yaml
['-c', 'pyproject.toml', '-r', '-ll']
```
